resources.string: Run through the gate to start recording
Complete some laps to see your stats
Delete all sessions, runs, and cached thumbnails. This cannot be undone.
This will permanently delete all training sessions, run history, and cached thumbnail images. This action cannot be undone.
Get notified about Pro features after %d days
Remind me if I haven\'t trained in %d days
Prompt to rate the app after %d sessions
In-app celebration when you set a new PB
These notifications appear as banners while using the app. They are always enabled.
Send a test notification to verify your settings are working correctly.
Enable notifications in system settings to receive reminders.
Unlock multi-phone sync, unlimited history & more
Complete runs to record your times
Sign in to sync data across devices
You\'ll need to sign in again to sync your data across devices.
This will permanently delete your account and ALL associated data including your profile, sessions, runs, and athletes. This action cannot be undone.
Are you sure you want to delete this session? This cannot be undone.
Your timing sessions will appear here
Share this code with your partner
Enter the 6-digit code shown on the other device
Connected via cloud relay (BLE unavailable). Timing may have higher uncertainty.
Each phone acts as a timing gate. Choose which position this phone will be at.
Detects when the runner leaves the start line. Acts as the reference clock.
Detects when the runner crosses the finish line. Syncs clock to start phone.
Bluetooth permissions required for device pairing
Choose roles and pair devices via Bluetooth
Point cameras at the track and start the session
This phone is advertising as the reference clock. Start the other phone as \'Finish Phone\' to connect.
Scanning for a Start Phone nearby\u2026
Exchanging timing samples to calculate clock offset between devices\u2026
Position this phone at the %s and point the camera at the track.
Sync clocks between devices for accurate timing.
Place both devices nearby and tap Pair. Clocks will synchronize automatically.
Make sure both devices have the app open on this screen
Waiting for other device to connect\u2026
Start the other device as \'Sync to Another Device\'
Make sure the other device is set as \'Reference Clock\'
Turn your phone into a\nprofessional timing system
Already have an account? Sign In
Get started in under a minute
Pair phones, auto sync over Bluetooth
Five start methods: flying start, touch release, countdown
Place at finish line, no calibration needed
You\'re all set! TrackSpeed can now detect when athletes cross the finish line.
TrackSpeed needs camera access to detect finish line crossings. Please enable it in Settings.
TrackSpeed uses your camera to detect athletes crossing the finish line.
Place your phone at the finish line.\nThe camera detects athletes as they cross.
Enter your best time for a flying sprint
Set a target time for your %s flying sprint
Set a target time for your flying sprint
Set your PR and goal time\nto see your journey
Choose the method that fits your training
Hands on ground \u2014 timer starts when you lift off
Timer starts when crossing the gate at full speed
Camera detects motion to start timing
Athletes who track their times improve faster than those who train without timing data.
Studies show that objective performance feedback significantly enhances motor learning. Without results tracking, improvement slows dramatically.
This helps us personalize your experience
Training alone is tough. Together, you\'ll hit your goals faster.
Send your referral link to friends who run
When a friend starts a TrackSpeed subscription
Get 1 free month for each friend who subscribes
Check out TrackSpeed - turn your phone into a sprint timer! Use my referral link: %s
Get timely updates to keep your training on track.
We want you to track\nyour sprints for free
We\'ll remind you before it ends
Get notified 2 days before your trial expires
One tap in settings and you\'re done
You\'ll get a reminder 2 days before your trial ends
We\'ll send you a notification so you\'re never caught off guard.
Try your luck for a special offer
Test detection with one phone \u2014 no subscription needed
See how the camera tracks movement
Time yourself with a single phone
Set phone down and\nget into position
Set phone down and\nget into position
There\'s an issue with your subscription. Tap to resolve.
Step into the camera view, then step away to start the timer
Gate-triggered start. Timer starts when athlete crosses the gate line.
3\u2026 2\u2026 1\u2026 BEEP! Visual countdown with automatic start.
"\"On your marks\u2026 Set\u2026 GO!\" Spoken commands like a real starter."
Touch screen, hold, then lift finger to start the timer.
Calculate wind-adjusted sprint times using the Moinat et al. model
Convert between meters, yards, feet, miles, and kilometers
Positive wind = tailwind, negative = headwind. Legal limit: +2.0 m/s.
Uses the formula \u0394P = a\u00B7w + b\u00B7w\u00B2 from Moinat, Fabius & Emanuel (2018), derived from 150,169 competition results.
Tailwind helps less than headwind hurts due to quadratic air drag. For 100m, the correction also scales with performance level -- amateur athletes benefit more from wind than elites.
Complete some timing sessions\nto see your stats here.
